Key Match Events: Romain Saiss scored the opening goal for Morocco
Novatus Miroshi was sent off for Tanzania
Azzedine Ounahi scored the second goal for Morocco
Youssef En-Nesyri scored the third goal for Morocco
Post-Match Reflections: Morocco made a successful start in the Africa Cup of Nations
Tanzania will be wondering what they can do to get anything from this group
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game started in a relatively timid fashion
The Atlas Lions began playing like a side who had reached the World-Cup semi-final just over a year ago
Others: Hakim Ziyech was named the Player of the Match
